Rulings.Base: 1. This card targets 1 "T.G." Synchro Monster in your GY.\n2. You cannot activate this card if a "T.G." monster you control battles a monster with the same ATK and both are destroyed and sent to the GY.\n3. You can Chain multiple copies of "TG-SX1" to each other.

PSCT.Base: When a "T.G." monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Target 1 "T.G." Synchro Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.
